QuestData.Title: To Speak With Har'koa
QuestData.Description: The gods have spoken, $n. We now know what you must do.$B$BYou must now go to the Altar of Har'koa to the southeast and speak with the leopard goddess.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Har'koa at the Altar of Har'koa.
QuestData.RewardText: Listen closely, little $r. Time is of the essence.
